body:
Hi Ery,


Looks like you installed Ruby *after* installing OpenStudio, so the OS
installer didn't install the Ruby stuff. I think if you just reinstall
OpenStudio you will be all set. BTW, version 0.8.3 is current, and 0.8.4
will have Radiance integrated into the GUI!).


I'll look into the Boost version dependency for you.




Rob Guglielmetti
National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL)
Commercial Buildings Research Group
15013 Denver West Parkway MS:RSF202
Golden, CO 80401
303.275.4319
robert.guglielmetti at nrel.gov












On 8/27/12 10:42 AM, "Ery Djunaedy" <ery.mailinglist at gmail.com> wrote:
